scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "pnpm --filter backend dev" "pnpm --filter frontend dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm run backend:build && pnpm run frontend:build
scripts.test:all: pnpm --filter backend test && pnpm --filter frontend test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter backend lint && pnpm --filter frontend lint
scripts.type-check: pnpm --filter backend type-check && pnpm --filter frontend type-check
